pageContext.claim: “Puerto Rico is one of the most corrupt places on earth. Their political system is broken and their politicians are either Incompetent or Corrupt. Congress approved Billions of Dollars last time, more than anyplace else has ever gotten, and it is sent to Crooked Pols. No good!.... ....And by the way, I'm the best thing that’s ever happened to Puerto Rico!”
pageContext.analysis: This is a stunning wholesale indictment from the president of the political system of a U.S. territory. Congress appropriated relief funds for Puerto Rico after it was badly wrecked by Hurricane Maria, and his assertion that all of it went to crooked politicians is false.
